IDENTIFICACAO-DO-GRUPO.NOME-DA-UNIDADE: Departamento de Engenharia de Computação e Sistemas Digitais
IDENTIFICACAO-DO-GRUPO.NOME-DO-ORGAO: Departamento de Engenharia de Computação e Sistemas Digitais
IDENTIFICACAO-DO-GRUPO.REPERCUSSOES: The Safety Analysis Group - GAS of the Department of Computing Engineering and Digital Systems of the Engineering School of University of São Paulo aims to do researches and projects related to safety, dependability and availability of Computing Systems applied mainly in critical areas such as subway and railway transportation, air transportation, petrochemical industry, nuclear power plants, medical systems, among others. In this way, have been studied in the GAS the aspects related to fault tolerance in computer systems, also covering the quality of software aspects.It can be pointed out the methodology, safety, reliability, availability, testability and redundancy, aiming to improve the project quality. Another key aspect of GAS work is the certification of real time embedded software applied on areas that demands high reliability and / or safety systems. The GAS research topics are related to the study of techniques to the development and assessment of computer systems used in critical systems of high safety and reliability, getting a result of several master's and PhD theses in this specific area of knowledge.

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: O presente estudo visa analisar, portanto, o nível de resiliência logística atualmente existente no fluxo diário de aeronaves dentro de uma área de controle terminal (TMA). Busca ainda quantificar os parâmetros usais de tempo e recurso necessários ao retorno das atividades de tráfego após a ocorrência de um evento perturbador. Para atingir esses objetivos, são empregadas técnicas de simulação de eventos discretos para melhor compreender o fluxo do sistema logístico e quantificar seus parâmetros
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Resiliência em Transporte Aéreo

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Planejamento e Organização do Sistema de Transporte

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Qual a estratégia de implantação do ADS-B que deveria ser adotada pelo Brasil para garantir o incentivo aos stakeholders minimizando os custos e o impacto durante o processo de transição?
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Logística em Transporte Aéreo

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE-DO-CONHECIMENTO: Planejamento e Organização do Sistema de Transporte

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: In this research project, the goal is developing a framework to safety and resilience analysis of the future automotive cyber-physical critical systems considering its influence on the higher level System of Systems. This analysis framework will be based on fast-time and real-time computer simulations, where Model-In-the-Loop (MIL), Hardware-In-The-Loop (HIL) and Human-In-The-Loop could be considered. As example, it will evaluate the communication and collision avoidance system
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Safety and Resilience in Automotive Cyber Physical Systems

PALAVRAS-CHAVE.PALAVRA-CHAVE: Infrastructures and tools for autonomous systems

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: The main objective of this first collaborative research in carrying out the research projects related to the areas of research opportunity in Air Traffic Management (ATM):a) Human Factors and ATM efficiencyb) Safety Analysis of Complex Systemsc) Priority and Maneuvering in airspaced) ATM system information management and sharing (SWIM developments)
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: RESEARCH ON SAFETY IN AVIATION TECHNOLOGIES AND ATM
